ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Gordon on xp
ygData.msgSnippet: err, that s not an all hybrid group.  that s 2 hybrids (you, ranger) and 3 pure melee (warrior, 2 monks).  you were killing things so fast because you had the
ygData.messageBody:
err, that's not an all hybrid group. that's 2 hybrids (you, ranger) and 3
pure melee (warrior, 2 monks). you were killing things so fast because you
had the 3 pure melee high damage dealers. it was, as you say, and all tank
group though.

Shada

> and i agree on the all hybrid groups. I was in one other day as main
> assist/puller/healer other night and we we killing faster
> then they spawned.
> Was me, a warrior, 2 monks and a ranger snaring. Amen to
> fear kiting with
> all tanks group.
>
> Minkin
> aching to be 46 bard (1 blue bub to go!)
